extensionDescription.message: 2025 Setz naye temas, shtiker, shriftn, un bretter, fir di ale inleytungen, pops-ups, un so vayter.

header_subtitle.message: Mir libn Lichess! Zoln mir es nokh beser mochn.

mi_1.message:
Aktivirn "Focus mode" 
 (bester far Streams un Bullet)

mi_17.message: Fueg a gantsbildknopf tsu (unten rekhter ekn)

d_subtitle.message: Ikh farbrekhe shtunden ale vokh farbesern bogs, tsufign un fartseykhn features, un afenemen problemn fun di nutser. Dayn shtrikhn iz kritish far di vegzetsung fun der arbet!

d_card.message: Shenk durkh kredit oder debit kartn

d_cred__1.message: Du kenst oykh shern LichessHelper mit dayne fraynd oder loz a

s_subtitle.message: Do iz aynige vegs-shtrakhlungn, vos du kenst probirn:

s_res__2.message: Deaktivir un dan aktivir LichessHelper vegn.

s_emailme.message: Ven di problem iz nokh do, bit ikh dikh shmeysele af

s_effic.message: Tsulib mir helfn dir efektiv, bit ikh dikh arayn doser informatsye:

s_detail__1.message: Di version fun LichessHelper vos du nutst.

s_detail__2.message: A screenshot oder video vos derzeygt dos problem.

s_detail__3.message: A detaillirte beshraybung fun dem problem.

s_detail__4.message: Dayn browser un zayn version (zum beyspil, Firefox 86.0).

mi_14.message:
אָפּשאַלטן באָרד באַוועגונג סקראָלינג 
(פֿאָר טראַקפּאַדס, אונדז.)
